name: London Global Consultants
tag_list: business-to-business, social-science, aesthetic, consulting, cross-culture-management, software-architecture, robotics, artificial-intelligence, intercultural-competence, human-centered-design, intercultural-communication
overview:
London Global Consultants is a consultancy for behavioral and cultural profiling based on the innovative and award-winning consulting concept of Kristin Muller-Wenzel.

We are looking beyond the obvious and find out the true intentions and potentials of persons and organisations. Our expertise is founded by a background in anthropology and psychology combined with an eye for behavioral pattern and details. We are certified micro-expression experts. Our specialty is seeing inconsistencies in speech, body language, micro-expression and appearance that imply deceptions and hidden intentions.

Our clients are HR Departments and Recruiters, that want to find the perfect candidate and built a winning team; Investment, Merging and Acquisition Companies, that want to enhance their outcome of negotiations, reduce their risks of investments and cooperation; and Organisations, that want to protect themselves from deception and fraud, find out the truth and want to clarify situations.
